entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
